text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hi my name is madelina an AWS Enterprise
support team member here at the AWS
office in Seattle today I'm going to
show you how to add a new payment method
to your AWS account let's get started
first sign in to the AWS Management
console and then navigate to the billing
and cost Management console
then navigate to payment preferences on
the left side panel
you can see your Associated payment
methods that are currently on your
account on this page to update or change
your payment methods choose the orange
add payment method button and then enter
your billing details
you can choose to use your default
billing address or enter a new one
after you submit the information a new
payment method will be on file for your
account
to set this new payment method as a
default payment method choose status
default and the new payment method will
be used for all new charges
your seller of record information or
your preferred currency can affect the
payment methods that are available for
your account
note that if you change your default
payment method at the end of an AWS
billing cycle the charges might still be
billed to the original payment method
it's the best practice to change your
payment method after the previous
month's bill is finalized
thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at AWS
[Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
[Music]
